contents.Text: [[[underline:Soft Purple]]] ≈ Select Directory
[[[underline:Soft Yellow]]] ≈ Select values
[[[underline:Dark Blue]]] ≈ Input replacement value
[[[underline:Light Green]]] ≈ Save/Discard
[[[underline:Pale Orange]]] ≈ Confirm/View changes
[[[strong:Left-click]]]to select a directory to edit.
[[[strong:Right-click]]]to queue the directory for regeneration. This action removes the directory from the database and re-imports it fresh.
Select columns or cells to edit.
Tip: Hold shift left click then scroll down in the same column and Hold shift and left click again and all cells in between will be selected.
[[[strong:• Four-letter code]]]- requires a standardized four-character code example: "2015"
[[[strong:• Integer only]]]- accepts only whole numbers
[[[strong:• Read-only]]]- cannot be modified by users
[[[strong:• name]]]- The title or name of the audio file ([[[warning:read-only]]])
[[[strong:• ext]]]- The file extension (e.g., mp3, wav, flac) ([[[warning:read-only]]])
[[[strong:• played]]]- Tracks if the file has been played ([[[warning:read-only]]])
[[[strong:• length]]]- Duration of the audio file ([[[warning:read-only]]])
[[[strong:• artist]]]- The performing artist or creator
[[[strong:• album]]]- The album or collection the file belongs to
[[[strong:• genre]]]- The musical or content genre
[[[strong:• language]]]- The language of the audio content
[[[strong:• lyrics]]]- Contains song lyrics if available
[[[strong:• year]]]- The release or recording year ([[[warning:integer only]]])
[[[strong:• country]]]- Country of origin ([[[warning:four-letter code]]],[[[warning:integer only]]])
[[[strong:• label]]]- The publishing or record label
[[[strong:• release_type]]]- Type of release (e.g., album, single, EP)
[[[strong:• tags]]]- Custom user defined tags
[[[strong:• user_ratings]]]- User or community rating ([[[warning:integer only]]])
[[[strong:• metadata_comments]]]- Comments included in the file's metadata
[[[strong:• user_notes]]]- Personal notes added by the user
Once cells are selected type the value you want to replace it with in the text box.
Press enter to confirm and add the values to the Save/Discard.
Tip: you can drag the "Input replacement value" up to display less buttons thus improving performance.
Save changes: Press the button to commit all changes in "Confirm/View changes".
Discard all changes: Press the button to discard all changes in "Confirm/View changes".
This section is a little more complex see [[[button:Confirm/View changes][View Changes]]] for more information.
